p: In the current study, the constructed AF-AgNPs molecules were built up by the combination of the plant extract with AgNO 3, which produced a colorless solution, upon subjecting to the day sunlight for 30 min, the color had changed to light yellow and turned into dark brown or reddish-brown at the end of the incubation period, as shown in Figure 1. Several studies showed similar observations: the study of the silver nanoparticles loaded by extracts from Allophylus serratus leaf [ 18] or by Tectona grandis seeds extract [ 19].
